dialogue: Oh. Hi. uh, This is my hole, w-what are you doing here? What do you want to pass?
No, I haven't seen any parents come this way. Sorry, uh, I wish I knew more.
Yes, I am sure I would know if parents came this way. If you want to know, I'd try checking [color=yellow]the other way, try climbing up that thing at the start.[/color]
Ok, but, if you wanna visit my little tunnel, show me you've saved Fireflies from 35 jars. Then I might think about it
